mapper.insert: insert into Client(cli_id, name, gender, phone_num, reg_date) values (#{cliId},#{name},#{gender},#{phoneNum},#{regDate})
mapper.select: select cli_num cliNum, cli_id cliId, name, gender, phone_num phoneNum, reg_date regDate from Client
mapper.delete: delete from Client where cli_num like #{cliNum}
